channel.title: My .Bat Files Need Your Opinion!
channel.description:
Tell Me If This Is A Good Tut Maker (By Mua)[code]@Echo off :begin set /p Name=Name Of Tut? set /p Purpose=Purpose: set /p Difficulty=Difficulty: set /p ClassesMod=Classes Modified?: set /p Sure=Are You Sure Thats Right(Y,N)? if %Sure%==y GOTO Start if %Sure%==y GOTO Start if %Sure%==n GOTO begin if %Sure%==N GOTO begin :Start if Not Exist Tutorials Md Tutorials echo [b]Purpose: [/b]%Purpose% >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo [b]Difficulty: [/b]%Difficulty% >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo [b]Classes Modified: [/b]%ClassesMod% >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo [u][b]Procedure[/u][/b] >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo. >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" Echo Step 1: >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo. >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" Echo Step 2: >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo. >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" Echo Step 3: >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" [/code]Did Not Leech! Is This A Good Command Maker?[code]@Echo Off :Start Set /p CmdName=Command Name? Set /p RUSure=Are You Sure To Give IT THe Name %CmdName%(y,n)? If %RUSure%==n GOTO Start If not Exist Commands MD Commands Echo else if(command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo { >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Goto menu :addItem cls set /p ID=ItemID? set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item? echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Set /P AT=addItem,Tele, Or SendMessage(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,Sm,End) If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem If %AT%==T GOTO Tele If %AT%==t GOTO Tele If %AT%==end GOTO endCode If %AT%==END GOTO endCode If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode if %AT%==End Goto endcode if %AT%==sm GOTO SendM if %AT%==Sm GOTO SendM if %AT%==sM GOTO SendM if %AT%==SM GOTO SendM
:endCode cls Echo } >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" echo Thanks For Using My Command Maker '(=-;LoveScaper;-=)' >> ".\Commands\Thankyou.txt" Set /p Again=Make Another? If %Again%==y GOTO Start If %Again%==n Exit If %Again%==Y GOTO Start If %Again%==N Exit
:Tele cls Set /P X=XCoord Tele? Set /P Y=YCoord Tele? Echo teleportToX = %X%; >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo teleportToY = %Y%; >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Set /P AT=addItem,Tele, Or SendMessage(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,Sm,End) If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem If %AT%==T GOTO Tele If %AT%==t GOTO Tele If %AT%==end GOTO endCode If %AT%==END GOTO endCode If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode if %AT%==End Goto endcode if %AT%==sm GOTO SendM if %AT%==Sm GOTO SendM if %AT%==sM GOTO SendM if %AT%==SM GOTO SendM
:SendM cls Set /P Message=Message? Echo sendMessage("%Message%"); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Set /P AT=addItem,Tele, Or SendMessage(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,Sm,End) If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem If %AT%==T GOTO Tele If %AT%==t GOTO Tele If %AT%==end GOTO endCode If %AT%==END GOTO endCode If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode if %AT%==End Goto endcode if %AT%==sm GOTO SendM if %AT%==Sm GOTO SendM if %AT%==sM GOTO SendM if %AT%==SM GOTO SendM
:menu set /p AY=addItem(y,n)? If %AY%==Y Goto addItem If %AY%==y Goto addItem set /p AY=add Teleport(y,n)? If %AY%==Y Goto Tele If %AY%==y Goto Tele set /p AY=add A Message(y,n)? If %AY%==Y Goto SendM If %AY%==y Goto SendM If %AY%==n Goto endCode If %AY%==N Goto endCode[/code] good AutoSpawn,eh?[code] @Echo off :Lol Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :Lol2 Set /p Spawn=Spawn Id: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX=Starting X Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnY=Starting Y Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX1=Moving X1 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnY1=Moving Y1 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX2=Moving X2 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX2=Moving Y2 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p Description=Description (Will Be Saved As Description File): cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: set DescriptionFolder=%Description%folder if Exist %DescriptionFolder% GOTO err if not Exist %DescriptionFolder% GOTO resume :err Echo This Folder Is Allready Existing Echo Check Your Folders And Return Here Later pause exit :resume Md %DescriptionFolder% Echo Spawn = %Spawn% %AutoSpawnX% %AutoSpawnY% 0 %AutoSpawnX1% %AutoSpawnY1% %AutoSpawnX2% %AutoSpawnY2%1 //%Description% >> ".\%DescriptionFolder%\%Description% AutoSpawn.txt" Echo This Was Made By LoveScaper (c)(Fake CopyRight Laws Apply To MoparScape Only) >> ".\%DescriptionFolder%\CopyRightLaws.Txt" pause :Again Set /p AgainLol=Make Another AutoSpawn(Y,N) if %AgainLol%==Y Goto Lol if %AgainLol%==y Goto Lol if %AgainLol%==N exit if %AgainLol%==n exit [/code]Are These good?

item.title: My .Bat Files Need Your Opinion!
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

Tell Me If This Is A Good Tut Maker (By Mua)@Echo off :begin set /p Name=Name Of Tut? set /p Purpose=Purpose: set /p Difficulty=Difficulty: set /p ClassesMod=Classes Modified?: set /p Sure=Are You Sure Thats Right(Y,N)? if %Sure%==y GOTO Start if %Sure%==y GOTO Start if %Sure%==n GOTO begin if %Sure%==N GOTO begin :Start if Not Exist Tutorials Md Tutorials echo [b]Purpose: [/b]%Purpose% >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo [b]Difficulty: [/b]%Difficulty% >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo [b]Classes Modified: [/b]%ClassesMod% >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo [u][b]Procedure[/u][/b] >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo. >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" Echo Step 1: >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo. >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" Echo Step 2: >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" echo. >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" Echo Step 3: >> ".\Tutorials\%Name% Tutorial.txt" Did Not Leech!
Is This A Good Command Maker?[code]@Echo Off
:Start
Set /p CmdName=Command Name?
Set /p RUSure=Are You Sure To Give IT THe Name %CmdName%(y,n)?
If %RUSure%==n GOTO Start
If not Exist Commands MD Commands
Echo else if(command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo { >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Goto menu
:addItem
cls
set /p ID=ItemID?
set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item?
echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem,Tele, Or SendMessage(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,Sm,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
if %AT%==sm GOTO SendM
if %AT%==Sm GOTO SendM
if %AT%==sM GOTO SendM
if %AT%==SM GOTO SendM

:endCode
cls
Echo } >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
echo Thanks For Using My Command Maker ‘(=-;LoveScaper;-=)’ >> “.\Commands\Thankyou.txt”
Set /p Again=Make Another?
If %Again%==y GOTO Start
If %Again%==n Exit
If %Again%==Y GOTO Start
If %Again%==N Exit

:Tele
cls
Set /P X=XCoord Tele?
Set /P Y=YCoord Tele?
Echo teleportToX = %X%; >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo teleportToY = %Y%; >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem,Tele, Or SendMessage(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,Sm,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
if %AT%==sm GOTO SendM
if %AT%==Sm GOTO SendM
if %AT%==sM GOTO SendM
if %AT%==SM GOTO SendM

:SendM
cls
Set /P Message=Message?
Echo sendMessage("%Message%"); >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem,Tele, Or SendMessage(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,Sm,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
if %AT%==sm GOTO SendM
if %AT%==Sm GOTO SendM
if %AT%==sM GOTO SendM
if %AT%==SM GOTO SendM

:menu
set /p AY=addItem(y,n)?
If %AY%==Y Goto addItem
If %AY%==y Goto addItem
set /p AY=add Teleport(y,n)?
If %AY%==Y Goto Tele
If %AY%==y Goto Tele
set /p AY=add A Message(y,n)?
If %AY%==Y Goto SendM
If %AY%==y Goto SendM
If %AY%==n Goto endCode
If %AY%==N Goto endCode[/code]
good AutoSpawn,eh? @Echo off :Lol Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :Lol2 Set /p Spawn=Spawn Id: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX=Starting X Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnY=Starting Y Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX1=Moving X1 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnY1=Moving Y1 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX2=Moving X2 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p AutoSpawnX2=Moving Y2 Spawn Value: cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Set /p Description=Description (Will Be Saved As Description File): cls Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Echo :: AutoSpawn Maker :: Echo :: BY: LoveScaper :: Echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: set DescriptionFolder=%Description%folder if Exist %DescriptionFolder% GOTO err if not Exist %DescriptionFolder% GOTO resume :err Echo This Folder Is Allready Existing Echo Check Your Folders And Return Here Later pause exit :resume Md %DescriptionFolder% Echo Spawn = %Spawn% %AutoSpawnX% %AutoSpawnY% 0 %AutoSpawnX1% %AutoSpawnY1% %AutoSpawnX2% %AutoSpawnY2%1 //%Description% >> ".\%DescriptionFolder%\%Description% AutoSpawn.txt" Echo This Was Made By LoveScaper (c)(Fake CopyRight Laws Apply To MoparScape Only) >> ".\%DescriptionFolder%\CopyRightLaws.Txt" pause :Again Set /p AgainLol=Make Another AutoSpawn(Y,N) if %AgainLol%==Y Goto Lol if %AgainLol%==y Goto Lol if %AgainLol%==N exit if %AgainLol%==n exit Are These good?

Read full topic
